captions.text: How are you?
Great! How are you?
How are you?
I just moved here.
Really?
Yeah.
So you just play piano or guitar?
I play guitar too.
Have you ever been zip lining?
I'm not really that kind of a person.
Not willing to jump out and go crazy?
I'm parked in front.
Do you want to just ride with me?
I dont know, I'm just a very adventurous guy.
This car is awesome!
I dont really know how to drive a stick...
Oh Sh**. Really?
Do you want me to drive it?
No...

Let me drive it. I will show you what this
thing can do.
Um... so what do you like to do for fun on the weekends?
Go to a lot of music festivals. I like to write.
Uhhh, I think you might want to shift.
Sorry!

I like to play the drums.
And the bass guitar.
Um... I'm a ninja.
A what?
I'm a ninja.
I like to ride my bike.
I like to exercise and work out. Go rock climbing.
That's cool.
I like to go to live theater.
I'm really well rounded.
You might want to shift it again...
I'm just going to go over here to turn around.
Oh, yeah!
Are you serious?
Holy Sh**.
It's the wrong one...
Why are we going so fast?
So what else do you look for in a girl?
Someone that likes to party just as much as I do.
That's what I'm talking about!
Whoa, yeah baby!
You just whipped the sh** out of this car.
I'm a professional stunt driver.
And you've just been on Ford Mustang Speed
This is a camera here, here and here.
So, what did you think?
I guess you should me how to drive this thing...
This is, like, the best first date I've ever been on in my life.
